channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Brambles hanging from tree on footpath by metal bridge, 25th September
item.description:
There are three really long brambles hanging down from a tree when you walk from the black metal bridge through to the ornamental gardens and the river which catch you in the face and so need cutting down please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Riverside Close, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road signage needs a proper repainting, 25th September
item.description:
The road was recently dug up but the the painting on the new part highlights how the whole notice needs redoing. Bit of a jobsworth approach by the contractors. Now almost says 'no try', and have seen cars going the wrong way down this street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Street, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Adelaide Road, at the back of No. 13 Hornby Close, 25th September
item.description:
My house backs onto Adelaide Road. There seems to be a pothole in the middle of the road. It causes the houses along here to vibrate alarmingly when heavy vehicles drive over it; this is worse at night when parked cars force those vehicles into the middle of the road. This is obviously a safety hazard and must be causing structural damage to the houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexandra Road, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown trees behind 214 Southlands Road, 25th September
item.description:
Hi, There's a tree in the park that's overgrown and dropping leaves onto our property. I raised this before claim before, but it was rejected due to the tree being private. As you can see from the picture, it's within the park and behind the fence boundary? Can this be cut back please? Thanks, Tom

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Four blocked drains, 25th September
item.description:
There are 4 blocked drains walking down chapel street to Grosvenor place - at the bottom end of chapel street. Drain 1 just before the intersection with Headfort Place Drain 2 and 3 on the left hand side of the pavement leading down to Grosvenor Place Drain 4 inset into the pavement is blocked. I have reported all of these drains at least twice in the last 6 months. If these arenâ€™t unblock I will need to escalate

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-24, Chapel Street, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
